docs.text:
Shehan Caldera


Hello World! I'm Shehan. I'm a research student currently involved in deep learning for robotics. I like working with machine learning, analytics, and robotics projects.


Apart from coding (like all the time), I like travelling, photography, and driving around in my Ford.


If you have any project that you would like my insight or collaboration feel free to email at shehancaldera@gmail.com with a clear subject line.


Projects I've worked:






Robotic grasping with deep learning






Detecting robotic grasps usign deep convolutional neural networks






Design and development of a tennis ball launching machine






Development of a RGB color detection system






Design of a robotic platform for variable terrains






Grid solving robot for industrial payload delivery 






Find me:

docs.text:
Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.




Project layout


mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
